attributes.action: Racist conduct from those in Parliamentary positions.
attributes.additional_details:
I would like to put forward a motion that would allow the investigation of racism in to parliamentary parties.

In the light of recent events it would be expedient to cover both positive and negative racism very openly, as I believe both bring our country in to disrepute.

Allowing some of our citizens and not others the luxury of anti-racist protection laws not only makes a farce of the law itself, it also fuels antagonism between communities.
Racism both positive and negative is a dangerous thing and must be stamped out, furthermore favouritism must not be allowed to erode the good that has been achieved up until now..
